org.jhotdraw.draw
Class CompositeFigureEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      org.jhotdraw.draw.CompositeFigureEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CompositeFigureEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

Change event passed to CompositeFigureListeners.

Version:
3.0 2007-07-17 Renamed from DrawingEvent to CompositeFigureEvent.
2.1 2007-05-21 Added z-index property.
1.0 2006-01-14 Changed to support double precision coordinates.
1.0 2003-12-01 Derived from JHotDraw 5.4b1.
Author:
Werner Randelshofer
See Also:
Serialized Form
